channel.title: Environmental Variables Help! PLZ
channel.description: Ok so i tried alot of moparscape server tutorials and none are helping with running my server. I edited the runserver.bat. I have jdk 12. The problem is whenever i try to use runserver.bat, it says java is not recognized as an internal or external command. i kno it has to do with the environmental variables but no tutorials are helping :mad: :mad: :mad: . In my environmental variables this is what i Have: first one: Name:CLASSPATH Value:CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%; Second one: Name: PATH Value:C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin; and idk if i need this one but.... Name:JAVA_HOME Value:C:\Programs\Java\jdk1.6.12 And thts what i have. I hope someone sees something i did wrong!!! Note:The location of my java folder is C:\Program Files (x86). PLZ HELP!!!!!! ITS VERY FRUSTRATING :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:..........................plz?

item.title: Environmental Variables Help! PLZ

item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

first one: Name:CLASSPATH Value:CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
Name: PATH Value:C:\Program Filesm (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;
Name:JAVA_HOME Value:C:\Programs Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.12

replace it with these

item.title: Environmental Variables Help! PLZ

item.description:

Ok so i tried alot of moparscape server tutorials and none are helping with running my server. I edited the runserver.bat. I have jdk 12. The problem is whenever i try to use runserver.bat, it says java is not recognized as an internal or external command. i kno it has to do with the environmental variables but no tutorials are helping :mad: :mad: :mad: . I hope someone sees something i did wrong!!! Note:The location of my java folder is C:\Program Files (x86). PLZ HELP!!! ITS VERY FRUSTRATING :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:…plz?
